main.name: Joseph Lee
main.description: I am a passionate Computer Science student interested in machine learning and software development conducting machine learning based research.
main.bio: I am an undergraduate student veteran at the University of Virginia pursuing a Bachelor's Degree in Computer Science and Data Science. I served in the U.S. Army for 4 years with various experience. I am always looking for more opportunities to grow.
main.contactmessage: Here is where you should write your message to readers to have them get in contact with you.

education.description: Relevant Courses: Algorithms, Program & Data Representation, Discrete Mathematics, Digital Logic Design, Multivariable Calculus, Ordinaray Differential Equations, Probability

work.title: Teaching Assistant
work.description: Managed a class of ~100 students in interactive activities related to UX design. Lead weekly office hours for students on practices such as contextual inquiry and prototyping for Human-Computer Interaction in Software Development.

work.title: Motor Transport Operator / Translator
work.description: Supervised 3~4 associates on maintaining the assigned fleet of ten military vehicles that exceed $500,000 value while exceeding standards. Supported junior level supervisor in communicating with Korean nationals on retrieving inoperable military vehicles during field exercises while stationed in South Korea.

research.title: Undergraduate Researcher
research.description: Conducting data processing and machine learning based data analysis to analyze diagnosis of vestibular and neurological disorders in mouse models. Performing mouse handling, mouse behavior and video acquisition, fine tuning behavior tests, mouse genotyping, CRISPR gene editing, and hearing tests.

leadership.title: Diversity & Engagement Committee Member
leadership.description: Assisted committee chair and Council president with coordinating events targeting underrepresented groups in a class of 4,000 students.
